name: Deadly Space Boss Arena HD [Early Access]
name_original: Deadly Space Boss Arena HD [Early Access]
description:
Embark your journey as you go head to head with many different space bosses in the galaxy.



Deadly Space Boss Arena HD is a fast-paced arcade game that will have you hunting bosses for hours to unlocking and crafting new weapons and gear to help aid you in your journey against stronger bosses.



Features:


  • Fast-paced arcade shoot em' up gameplay.
  • Gorgeous 2D graphics.
  • In-game shop to purchase new weapons and hats for your character.
  • Many arenas to battle on from the fiery volcano to the deepest of the sea. body
  • 8 Gorgeous Arenas


Early Access Beta:

This game is still under development and won't be ready for full release until Spring/Summer 2015. However, you can participate in the "Early Access Beta" which will grant the "Deluxe Version" of the game which will include the following.


5 Extra Arenas


Regularly updated beta builds

Getting "Early Access" means you will be apart of the development process and you will updated builds of the game that may contain new content, features and bug fixes.

DSBA Artbook

Early Access players will receive a 26-page digital artbook which contains graphics, sprites and concept art from the game.

Free copies of Deadly Space Boss Arena 1 and 2

See how Deadly Space Boss Arena HD evolved since the 2013 release of Deadly Space Boss Arena and the 2014 release of DSBA 2 by receiving a free copy of each game. Both versions also includes Linux and Mac versions.
